cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with improving the spatial robustness of neural networks, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of regularization techniques is a common approach in machine learning (cs.LG) and the paper specifically focuses on invariance-inducing regularization. The paper also discusses the use of adversarial training, which is a popular topic in the field of adversarial machine learning (cs.AI). The paper uses mathematical proofs to support their claims, which is a common approach in theoretical computer science (cs.NE). Finally, the paper discusses the performance of their approach on image classification tasks, which is a common topic in natural language processing and computer vision (cs.CL).
